title: Federal Bank leads in loan expansion among Kerala banks in Q1
description: Federal Bank reported a 20% year-on-year rise in gross loan portfolio to Rs 2.24 lakh crore at the end of June. Fairfax-backed CSB Bank clocked a 17.8% rise in gross loans to Rs 25,099 crore while South India Bank's loan portfolio rose 11.4% to Rs 82,510 crore.
